description: This file defines the DeliveryFragment class, which is an Android Fragment responsible for managing the delivery tracking UI in a food delivery app. It handles displaying delivery stages, ETA updates, and user interactions such as cancellation.

classes.name: DeliveryFragment
classes.description: An Android Fragment that displays delivery progress, stages, and ETA for a food delivery application.

methods.name: onCreate
methods.description: Initializes the ViewModel and RecyclerView adapter.

methods.name: onViewCreated
methods.description: Binds views, sets up UI interactions, and observes ViewModel data.

methods.name: render
methods.description: Updates UI elements based on the current delivery order and ETA.

methods.name: buildTimelineRows
methods.description: Constructs a list of timeline rows representing each delivery stage with timestamps and ETA info.

methods.name: formatCountdown
methods.description: Formats remaining seconds into a string like 'Xm Ys' or 'Xs'.
